channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023070248
item.description:
Report X-2023070248

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-21T15:11:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On July 3rd a package was found to have leaked and had an odor during the AM sort. The package was marked as ID8000 Consumer Commodity, 9. Upon opening the package to investigate the odor, 2 bottles of perfume were found to have spilled. The shipper will be contacted to get an amended shippers dec after the package was placed into a salvage drum.
